document.title: Struggle for existence (Extract)
document.citation: Simple English Wikipedia: “Struggle for existence”. Retrieved from https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Struggle_for_ existence on 22 Aug 2015.
document.body: The struggle for existence refers to the competition between living things to survive. Many natural historians have noted the competition between animals. Generally speaking, they have been interested in the competition between species. [“Struggle for existence”]
